Posts.Content: Originally Posted by lancepeace I am sorry to hear about the diagnosis. What country does he live in? We probably could tell more if you had the scan results. If he had advanced cancer, maybe a urinary catheter would provide some relief. Good luck to you both. We are from india. PSA is 14.98 , Serum Chromogranin A Test : Negative , PET CT Scan : Shows a Lesion in the Peripheral Region of the Prostate 8cm * 7cm also there a Lesion near the lymph node 3cm. Is it Very painful to Use Urinary catheter? How long can he use it. Do he need a surgery for that?
Posts.Title: Frequent Urenation, No Sleep - How You Guys are Overcoming these problems.

Posts.Content: Thank You So much everyone for sharing your opinion and suggestion. I was really scared.
Posts.Title: Frequent Urenation, No Sleep - How You Guys are Overcoming these problems.

Posts.Content: This is my second post. My dad has been diagnosed with neuroendocrine carsinoma of the prostate. Do scans, blood test, wait for the report. this is what happening since last 2 months. No Treatment at all. My dad is not been able to sleep at least for an hour. Whenever he sleeps, he feels like going to Toilet. May be some of you might have also going through these problems. Doctors are only concerned about shrinking the tumor and no one is bothered about the trouble the patient is facing every day. I kindly request all to suggest your ideas to overcome this problem.
Posts.Title: Frequent Urenation, No Sleep - How You Guys are Overcoming these problems.

Posts.Content: I am from India. I don't even have the passport to take my dad to other country. I guess i am not able to make it. It will take lot of time here to apply and get my passport. Is it possible to get any suggestion from them if i mail all the reports to them.
Posts.Title: Spindle Cell Sarcoma of the Prostate - Any Cure?

Posts.Content: Is there anyone who can consult doctors on mayoclinic or other best oncologists on my behalf. I will send all my reports via email and pay the necessary fee using my credit card. Please please help. I tried on their website and it is asking for patient ID and without that i can't register there.
Posts.Title: Spindle Cell Sarcoma of the Prostate - Any Cure?

Posts.Content: My Dad has been diagnosed with Spindle Cell Sarcoma of the Prostate. Our Doctor is telling us that this is a Rare Type of Cancer and only 20 people in the world have this kind of cancer and they are also confused about what treatment is suitable for this. They also said that the tumor size is big and surgery is not possible. I don't want to Treat my dad with chemotherapy as it will destroy his immune system. Can this be cured with Hormone therapy or radiation Therapy. ? Age : 65 PSA is 14.98 PET-CT whole body scan report Lesion size : 8.0 * 8.9 Cm, Posteriorly the lesion is seen abutting the rectum with loss of fat plane. FDG Avid Necrotic lymph nodal mass is seen in perirectal region on left side, measuring 4.1*3.6 cm Left Para-aortic lymph node measuring 7mm. Bilateral common iliac lymph nodes, largest measuring 10mm. Bilateral external iliac lymph nodes, largest measuring 2.1*1.7cm on left side. No significant supraclavicular/cervical/mediastinal/axillary lymphadenopathy is noted. Degenerative changes are seen in the spinde. otherwise bones in the appopriate window show no focal lesions. Below the diaphragm, the liver is normal with no focal lesions. GB,spleen, panchreas, left kidney and adrenals are unremarkable. Simple Cortical cyst is noted in the right kidney. Histopathology Report Out of 13 cores, 10 cores shows malignant lesion displaying tumor cells in sheets with scanty cytoplasm and pleomorphic hyperchromatic oval to spindle nuclei. Areas of atypical mitoses and necrosis seen. Tumorr cells are seen involving the extraprostatic adipose tisse(G) and colonic Glands(I). Does anyone else have the Similar problem. What treatment are you taking.
Posts.Title: Spindle Cell Sarcoma of the Prostate - Any Cure?

Posts.Content: Thank You All for your response. I am extremely panic now. From Last one month. only tests are going on and no one starting any treatment. Every article on the internet is telling that the growth is aggressive. But none of the doctors are not taking any Immediate action to suppress the growth. Doctors are telling that surgery is not possible because of the Tumor Size. So only chemo and radiation is the choice. Has any one heard of CyberKnife Radiation therapy. Is it effective to Shrink the Tumor. I Started boosting his immune system with lots of fruits and vegetable juices hoping that might stop metastasize. Don't know whether it is a bad dream or real. I really can't believe this is happening.

Posts.Content: Thank You All for your response. I am extremely panic now. From Last one month. only tests are going on and no one starting any treatment. Every article on the internet is telling that the growth is aggressive. But none of the doctors are not taking any Immediate action to suppress the growth. Doctors are telling that surgery is not possible because of the Tumor Size. So only chemo and radiation is the choice. Has any one heard of CyberKnife Radiation therapy. Is it effective to Shrink the Tumor. I Started boosting his immune system with lots of fruits and vegetable juices hoping that might stop metastasize. Don't know whether it is a bad dream or real. I really can't believe this is happening.
